author.description: Entter is a digital artist and curator. He has been making art with old computers and video games since 2005. https://linktr.ee/vjentter

text: Dadaglobe Reconstructed reunites over 100 works created for Dadaglobe, Tristan Tzaraâ€™s planned but unrealized magnum opus, originally slated for publication in 1921. https://www.scheidegger-spiess.ch/en/produkt/dadaglobe-reconstructed/774
